service.name: document-manager
service.description: AI-powered documentation management SaaS platform with comprehensive analysis, improvement suggestions, and automated quality maintenance

postgres.purpose: Store application metadata, agent configurations, improvement queue, and audit logs

qdrant.purpose: Vector database for documentation embeddings, agent memory, and similarity pattern analysis

redis.purpose: Real-time messaging, notification channels, and caching

unstructured_io.purpose: Advanced document parsing and content extraction

business_model.target_market: Development teams, technical writers, documentation managers

setup.description: Initialize Document Manager with all resources and integrations

steps.name: generate-embeddings
steps.run: vrooli resource qdrant embeddings refresh --force || echo "Embeddings generation skipped (not critical)"
steps.description: Generate code embeddings for AI assistance

steps.name: add-data
steps.description: Add application data to resources (database schema, collections, workflows)

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o document-manager-api main.go

steps.name: verify-models
steps.run: curl -sf http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[ollama]}/api/tags | grep -E '(llama3.2|nomic-embed-text)' || echo 'Pulling required models...' && curl -X POST http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[ollama]}/api/pull -d '{"name": "llama3.2"}' & curl -X POST http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[ollama]}/api/pull -d '{"name": "nomic-embed-text"}' &
steps.description: Verify and pull required AI models

steps.name: show-urls

develop.description: Start document manager with coordination API and monitoring

steps.name: ensure-api-built
steps.run: if [ ! -f api/document-manager-api ]; then echo 'Building API...'; cd api && go mod download && go build -o document-manager-api main.go && echo 'API built successfully'; else echo 'API binary already exists'; fi

steps.name: start-api-server
steps.description: Start Go coordination API server in background

steps.name: wait-for-api
steps.description: Wait for API server to be ready

steps.name: configure-redis-notifications
steps.run: redis-cli -p ${RESOURCE_PORTS[redis]} CONFIG SET notify-keyspace-events Ex > /dev/null 2>&1 || echo 'Redis keyspace notifications configured'

steps.name: show-running-services
steps.description: Display all running service URLs and next steps

test.description: Test document manager API, integrations, and workflows

steps.name: test-go-build
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build main.go && rm test-build
